articles.title: WWE Hall of Famer Hulk Hogan dies at 71
articles.description: WWE Hall of Famer and former champion Hulk Hogan has died, according to
articles.content:
In this Nov. 24, 2009, file photo, Hulk Hogan gestures to the audience during his Hulkamania Tour at the Burswood Dome in Perth, Australia.
